divs: Sighting DetailsI wonder if any one reported any of these acurances ?I look up all the time hoping to get a glimps at a ufo and saw the first one of those coming home from granger indiana the usual red sircle whith tree green dots hovering over my car went over to the side of the road seamed to dance up and down for alittle while landed for a few minuts and took back off I on the other hand freaked out and left the area this happend in 2001 on fefurary 28 I think and there manny reports of it on the net thats not what I wanted to talk about though , this hapend over a three nihgt period i was in front of my house in the road at farviev dr in south bend looking up as usual , the first night I believed I was looking at aroral display, what appered in the sky where waves that appered to be moving from north to south filling the entire visable sky and there was sound that sounded like waves hitting the beach the second night was very deferent the designs became intracate the best way I can explane it is callidascope stars and geometrick forms changing verry rapidly no sound,the third night it became what appered to be roman figures like the ones that apear on 1920s and 30 silver dollars all of these looked to be in a blue haze and filled the entire sky I would not belive myself to be the only one to see this as they filled the entire sky unless I happened to be the only person to be looking up at three oclock in the morning. by the way the first night I got my friend to go out and look at it and he will not talk about it .this happened in 2004 just befor the tsunami in indonisa please tell me if any one reported anything like this p.s. i did think I was going nuts ,now i am just cureous and i can draw most of what I saw those nights thanks for your time and open mindedness
